instructions.da: Foretag en U-vending tilbage ad Cool highway
instructions.en: Make a U-turn and continue on Cool highway
instructions.es: Haz un cambio de sentido y continúa en Cool highway
instructions.es-ES: Haz un cambio de sentido y continúa en Cool highway
instructions.fi: Tee U-käännös ja jatka tietä Cool highway
instructions.fr: Faire demi-tour et continuer sur Cool highway
instructions.he: פנה פניית פרסה והמשך על Cool highway
instructions.id: Putar balik ke arah Cool highway
instructions.it: Fai un'inversione ad U poi continua su Cool highway
instructions.nl: Draai om en ga verder op Cool highway
instructions.pl: Zawróć i jedź dalej Cool highway
instructions.pt-BR: Faça o retorno e continue em Cool highway
instructions.pt-PT: Faça inversão de marcha e continue em Cool highway
instructions.ro: Întoarceți-vă și continuați pe Cool highway
instructions.ru: Развернитесь и продолжите движение по Cool highway
instructions.sv: Gör en U-sväng och fortsätt på Cool highway
instructions.tr: Bir U-dönüşü yap ve Cool highway devam et
instructions.uk: Здійсніть розворот та рухайтесь по Cool highway
instructions.vi: Quẹo ngược lại trên Cool highway
instructions.zh-Hans: 前方调头，继续在Cool highway上行驶
